title: FHD mid-range 4K ready smart TV solution
technology_highlights: Built in DDR3 512MB, reduce the external design of the single board;
Support 3G HDMI2.0 bandwidth signal input; support HDMI 4K content protection HCDP2.2;
Support China's national DTMB-T terrestrial broadcasting standards;;
Support 720p coding, while providing efficient video coding technology to meet the needs of the smooth multi screen interactive control;
